name: NSFilePromiseProviderDelegate
desc: A set of methods that provides the name of the promised file and writes the file to the destination directory when the file promise is fulfilled.

items.name: func filePromiseProvider(NSFilePromiseProvider, fileNameForType: String) -> String
items.desc: Provides the drag destination file's name.

items.name: func filePromiseProvider(NSFilePromiseProvider, writePromiseTo: URL, completionHandler: (Error?) -> Void)
items.desc: Writes the contents of a promise to the specified URL.

items.name: func operationQueue(for: NSFilePromiseProvider) -> OperationQueue
items.desc: Returns the operation queue from which to issue the write request.
